name: Zero-G Block for Magic Leap One
name_original: Zero-G Block for Magic Leap One
description:
Play with a block like if you were in Space. Move with "force like" powers or with controller in Magic Leap One. Have the block bounce off of you furniture, walls and Ceiling.

Controls

Touchpad- To Control Z and X axis

Home button - Reset position in font of user

Point finger gesture - To rotate

Open hand Gesture- Block "forward" movement

Fist gesture- Block "reverse" movement
